Note: Initials  "A.J.M."(?) appears on the bottom left of illustration. Date based on dates of 1st World War. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text says to help the wounded horses at the war and send donations to a society for the encouragement of kindness to animals. Illustration shows a wounded horse.
